Package net.minestom.server.instance

@NotNullByDefault package net.minestom.server.instance

  • Class
    Description
    Chunk
    A chunk is a part of an Instance, limited by a size of 16x256x16 blocks and subdivided in 16 sections of 16 blocks height.
    ChunkLoader
    Interface implemented to change the way chunks are loaded/saved.
    DynamicChunk
    Represents a Chunk which store each individual block in memory.
    EntityTracker
    Defines how entities are tracked within an instance.
    EntityTracker.Target<E extends Entity>
    Represents the type of entity you want to retrieve.
    EntityTracker.Update<E extends Entity>
    Callback to know the newly visible entities and those to remove.
    Explosion
    Abstract explosion.
    ExplosionSupplier
     
    Instance
    Instances are what are called "worlds" in Minecraft, you can add an entity in it using Entity.setInstance(Instance).
    InstanceContainer
    InstanceContainer is an instance that contains chunks in contrary to SharedInstance.
    InstanceManager
    Used to register Instance.
    LightingChunk
    A chunk which supports lighting computation.
    Section
     
    SharedInstance
    The SharedInstance is an instance that shares the same chunks as its linked InstanceContainer, entities are separated.
    Weather
    Represents the possible weather properties of an instance
    WorldBorder
    Represents the world border state of an Instance, can be retrieved with Instance.getWorldBorder().
